title: Guests: MJ Kinman, Riane Menardi Morrison, Teresa Wong, and Cassandra Beaver
description:
I saw MJ Kinman’s gem quilts and was very intrigued. How did she come up with those and how does she design them?
---------
I love Riane Menardi Morrison's style, very focused on shapes and color. She specializes in big modern shapes and her work is entirely hand quilted with high contrast stitching. If you belong to the Modern Quilt guild you will recognize her name as she does the emails, webinars, etc
--------
Teresa Duryea Wong is an author, story teller, and a quilt maker. She has been a writer for many industries and now her focus is on quilting. Her books are filled with gorgeous photos and interesting quilting information. Focused on topics like her ‘American Cotton: Farm to Quilt’ and her information books on Japanese quilts.
------------
Cassandra Beaver of The Not So Dramatic Life has a rich background in making. She create quilts with a lot structure both in the design and the quilting of the. She has won awards for her quilts and she also teaches you how to create a unique piece all your own.
================
Visit American Patchwork & Quilting at www.allpeoplequilt.com.
Visit host Pat Sloan at www.patsloan.com.
